name: Strip Shooter
description:
The game is simple: shoot to the pink points to undress the girl, but keep an eye on the timer and the bullets!

There are 8 different levels with increasing difficulty. In challenging mode, beating a level unlocks the access to the next level, and the access to the same level in free mode. Moreover, every level has a three star rating that can be achieved by completing it with a certain amount of bullets and time remaining. Once completed all the three star rating levels, a bonus level will be unlocked, and here... Maybe it's better if you find out by yourself.






This first release is deliberately pretty basic because we would like to hear your feedback and comments to improve and update the game. Shall you find any bugs or other kind of problems, please report to us, so we can fix them promptly.
